chapter.title: Installing BPView
chapter.para: This chapter describes briefly how to install BPView on an Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 host using the provided RPM packages.

section.title: Prerequisites for Installation
section.para: Before you can install BPView you have to make that the installation environment is suitable configured.

section.title: Supported Server Platforms
section.para:
BPView 0.10 is supported on the following platforms:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 x86_64

section.title: Hardware and Virtual Machine Recommendations
section.para: BPView can run on any hardware or virtualization environment supported for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6. To verify your hardware of virtualization platform is supported visit https://access.redhat.com

In order to run BPView correctly make sure the following minimum requirements are fulfilled:
CPU: 2 CPU cores
Memory: 2 GB of memory

note.para: The amount of CPU core and memory depends on the number of business processes you want to correlate and can a lot higher as the minimum requirements.

section.para: For best performance it's recommended to use tuned for tuning system performance. Please consult Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 documentation on how to tune the operating system.
